history.text: Hello
Hey there!
Tell me about the movie
The movie was called "The Avengers" With Robert Downing Jr.. He plays an amazing Iron Man.
Wow that sounds great
IS is good
Is it good?
Yes it is!
Is it funny?
It is funny. RDJ definitely is witty and snarky. He makes for excellent comedic relief
What is your favorite thing about it?
My favorite thing would have to be how the whole cast is an all star cast. So you know your getting talented actors who know how to fulfill their rolls.
Joss Whedon also is a great director that a lot of people can stand behind
Do you like Superhero Movies?
Not so much
I believe I have made a decision about if I will watch the movie
I can definitely see why people wouldnt like superhero movies, it can be difficult to grasp the outlandish plot. Thor and Loki, definitely provide for that in this movie.
What is your decision on the movie?
I grasp the plot just fine.  It's not complicated.
I have already seen it.
What did you not like about the movie? or liked?
I thought a lot of the scenes had good visual appeal and action, like when Loki opened the Wormhole over starktower
That seemed pretty coool.
I liked it at the time.  It's just not the best movie ever or anything.
I can agree with that. There have DEFINITELY been better movies. I enjoyed it because it had some drama and crisis here and there. Plus Scarlett Johansson is enough reason to see the movie as well.
Why is that?
She's not a great actress.

I just think that her role in the movie was great with her charming looks. I'm not very well versed in the world of acting but too me, she seemed to hit a bone with me. Especially the way she portrayed black widow.
Where are you from?
I am from the U.S. but did you remember the part where loki took over the S.H.I.E.L.D Facility? I thought that was a cool start to the movie and a great way to introduce the tesseract
I don't believe you are real.

I am real. We should just be talking about the movie, as is our objective. Did you like the part where they nodded that the avengers would return at the end of the movie? I was looking forward to seeing more.

uid1response.feedback: The other user left the chat and seemed to have other wants than to talk about the movie.
